commit message: Added build number to the version
Started migrating to a MediaBrowserServiceCompat as the player backend
Switched to showing Subscription images in the player instead of Episode images due to quality issues. Also fixed a bug in the parser
Added bulk download to a single feed
When the app subscribes to a feed it will only download a few recent episodes
Cleaned oyut some old code in the Playlist filter. Fixed a NPE
Updated a Toast message to a Snakckbar. Removed a potential NPE
